game_meta.title: Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets at Wake Forest Demon Deacons
game_meta.venue: Allegacy Federal Credit Union Stadium, Winston-Salem, NC

weather.notes: Morning showers tapering by midday; light NE breeze

hype_factors: Wake in spoiler role at home off a bye
Series streak: GT has won 4 straight
Weather could tilt game script to the run

away.name: Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets
motivation_factors: Maintain Top-20 ranking and ACC push

matchup_history.recent_trend: Georgia Tech has won 4 straight vs Wake Forest

odds.consensus_note: Open GT -17/-750 to ~-14/-575; market respect for home dog while public also on WAKE +14.

key_trends: Georgia Tech is 3-1 ATS; Wake Forest is 1-2 ATS in 2025
UNDER is 2-1 in Wake Forest games this season
Georgia Tech has covered and won the last two meetings at Wake (2017, 2023)
situational_spots: Wake off a bye; GT in potential noon road favorite 'flat spot'
Line crash from -17 to -14 offers better number for favorite if market overreacted

moneyline.rationale: Heavy juice on GT; dog price attractive but injuries limit upset equity

spread.rationale: Contrarian to public with improved number after 3-pt steam toward dog; GT run game vs banged-up WAKE front in damp conditions

total.rationale: Market drifted down; Wake offense middling and weather/field could slow pace

best_bet.rationale: Fade public dog with a superior team and favorable matchup script

injuries_news: Wake Forest missing multiple starters (OL/CB/Front seven) incl. OG N. Pahanich and CB B. Winston III
GT RB depth boosted with Trelain Maddox trending available; Jamal Haynes coming off 100-yard game
matchup_notes: GT rush offense (~249 RYPG) should test WAKE’s thin defensive front
Market moved off GT -17 to -14; potential buyback spot on favorite
coaching_notes: GT: Brent Key in year 3 building momentum
WAKE: Jake Dickert’s first season; looking for signature win

excitement_factors.playoff_implications: GT needs win to sustain Top-15 trajectory
excitement_factors.conference_impact: Early ACC positioning; GT aiming to stay unbeaten in league
excitement_factors.narrative: Ranked riser vs injury-hit home dog in possible rain game
tv_storylines: Can GT start 5-0 for first time since 2014?
Can WAKE spring a Top-25 upset at home?

sources.label: Wake Forest Opponent History vs Georgia Tech
